member.name: M:IAFG.IA.VI.AP.Forms.XmlTranslator.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Passing a string of XML code to be translated creates a DOM of the Xml fragment.

member.name: P:IAFG.IA.VI.AP.Forms.XmlTranslator.Errors
member.summary: Any errors encountered during translation will be contained in this ArrayList of strings.

member.name: M:IAFG.IA.VI.AP.Forms.XmlTranslator.TrimBody(System.String)
member.summary: If there is a body element, then all XML code outside of it is removed.

member.name: M:IAFG.IA.VI.AP.Forms.XmlTranslator.ToRtfDocument
member.summary: Initiates translation from XML to RTF (Rich Text Format) Returns an object representing a RTF document.

member.name: M:IAFG.IA.VI.AP.Forms.XmlTranslator.TranslateXmlNodeIntoRtfGroup(System.Xml.XmlNode,System.Int32)
member.summary: The primary method responsible for translating XML into RTF code. It recursively walks the XML DOM tree, building the RTF document as it goes.
member.param: The current node to be translated.
The XHTML font size (1-7) of the parent element.

member.name: M:IAFG.IA.VI.AP.Forms.XmlTranslator.TranslateXhtmlFontSizeIntoRtfFontSize(System.Int32)
member.summary: Translates an XHTML font size (1-7) into an RTF font size in half-points. Any errors result in a font size of 12 pts.

member.name: M:IAFG.IA.VI.AP.Forms.XmlTranslator.TranslateStyleFontSizeIntoRtfFontSize(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Translates a style sheet font size, which may have one of several different font measurements, into an RTF font size in half-points. The baseFontSize is required for measurements given in a form relative to the current font size. Any errors result in a font size of 12 pts.

member.name: M:IAFG.IA.VI.AP.Forms.XmlTranslator.TranslateXhtmlColorIntoColorFromArgb(System.String)
member.summary: Translates color arguments into Color object representations. The argument may either be a hexidecimal number #RRGGBB, one of sixteen predefined, case-sensitive names (these are used by the font element with the color attribute). NOTE: Predefined color names for style sheets are NOT supported. Style sheet colors must either be entered in as a hex number or in the form of: rgb float float float, where each float is a value between 0 and 1, representing relative amounts of red, green, and blue, respectively. Any errors result in a default of black (0, 0, 0).

member.name: T:IAFG.IA.VI.AP.Forms.XmlTranslator
member.summary: This class extends XmlDocument. It can hold a DOM of any XML document or fragment, which can be used to translate the XML into other forms. Currently, this class only supports translation from XML to RTF (Rich Text Format).
